VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: Boot-Loop Immunity
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Advanced optical filters prevent visual-based overload attacks (Boot Loops) from crashing this android's systems.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: Boot-Loop Critical
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this hardware suffer permanent boot loops when disrupted. Once triggered, the reset cycle cannot resolve on its own and leaves the unit inoperable until a pawn performs a software repair operation. Whether caused by failed optimization or deliberate design, this flaw ensures total reliance on external intervention.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: android flash
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: This android is fitted with a specialized optical discharge unit capable of projecting a sudden, blinding flash. The burst destabilizes exposed synthetic vision systems, forcing vulnerable machines into a disruptive boot loop cycle. While harmless to biological eyes and ineffective against shielded optics, it provides a decisive edge when facing unprotected android adversaries.
